agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_title: Agricultural Stewardship Act Complaint Files The series
series_description: documents the receipt of complaints pursuant to Agricultural Stewardship Act. This series may include, but is limited to: owner/operator information, stewardship plans, photographs, case notes, and correspondence relating to the complaint.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the monitoring of industrial hemp to ensure compliance with the Virginia Industrial Hemp Law. This series may include, but is not limited to, reports submitted by industrial hemp registrants and records related to the sampling and analysis of industrial hemp.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the registration process for Industrial Hemp Growers, Processors, Dealers, and Handlers and the agency's administration of the provisions of the Industrial Law pertaining to industrial hemp registrations. This series include, but is not limited to: registration applications, FBI Identity History Summaries, registrations issued, correspondence with the applicant or law enforcement, and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_title: Virginia Farm Link Program Files The series
series_description: documents the registration of farm owners and seekers through the Virginia Farm Link database. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications and correspondence.
